summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Valley Street, from Fairview Avenue to Boren Avenue North, and Fairview Avenue, from Roy Street to Valley Street, all in the City of Seattle, by laying watermains therein, of proper dimensions and material, together with all gates, tees, crosses, fire hydrants and other necessary appurtenances which may be necessary for the reasonable water service and fire protection of said district, in accordance with Resolution No. 99 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
